text: Lipany ('lindens'; ; ; ) is a town in the Prešov Region in Slovakia. About 6,400 people live there. == History == Lipany was first mentioned in 1312. In the 16th century, it got the town privileges. == Geography == The elevation is 387 m. Its area is 12.648 km². The Torysa River flows through the town. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Towns in Slovakia Category:Prešov Region
title: Lipany
